flexibleContent.heading: There are plethora of great advantages of IoT solutions.

contentLists.content: Effectively improves marketing automation.
Automated tracking process
Help reduce the business operations risk
Help measure performance and execute awareness drive
Shows real-time performance data
Allows taking precautionary measure
Easy for any Javascript developer to understand
IoT-enabled apps help monitor the behavior of devices
Helps reduce human errors due to automation

flexibleContent.heading: With Techtic’s IoT app development services, transform your traditional processes into smart ones, enhancing operational efficiency by automating manual tasks.

contentLists.heading: IoT Application Development
contentLists.content: Hire IoT developers to build native, web, or hybrid apps for platforms of your choice. We also have expertise in various languages, SDKs, and prevalent IoT frameworks and platforms.

contentLists.heading: IoT Development for Wearable Devices
contentLists.content: We can create amazing apps compatible with sensors and microcomputers available in wearable devices, including smartwatches, smart glasses, fitness trackers, etc.

contentLists.heading: IoT Gateway Development
contentLists.content: Device-to-device or device-to-cloud, we can provide you with the best IoT gateway development solution, whichever IoT communication you need.

contentLists.heading: Backend & API Development
contentLists.content: Build a solid API-driven backend that extends your company-wide automation, enabling integration with your software systems and subsystems.

contentLists.heading: IoT Cloud Platform
contentLists.content: Our IoT developers can help you achieve real-time processing and operations, leveraging the massive network of IoT devices and cloud computing.

contentLists.heading: App Development for IoT Devices
contentLists.content: Control your IoT hardware devices remotely through the app. Leverage the app for new feature releases on existing hardware

contentLists.heading: Data Analytics & Business Intelligence
contentLists.content: Techtic helps you with a unique solution that lets you visualize the data gathered by IoT systems to empower your business intelligence tools.

contentLists.heading: IoT solutions maintenance & Support
contentLists.content: As an IoT app development company, we ensure high performance by testing your entire IoT ecosystem and offer preventive maintenance services.

contentLists.heading: What are the benefits of outsourcing IoT app development?
contentLists.content:
• Improves marketing automation
  • Automated tracking process
  • Help reduce the business operations risk
  • Help measure performance and execute awareness drive
  • Shows real-time performance data
  • Allows taking precautionary measure
  • Easy for any Javascript developer to understand
  • IoT-enabled apps help monitor the behavior of devices
  • Helps reduce human errors due to automation

contentLists.heading: Why should i choose Techtic for IoT app development?
contentLists.content:
• Highly experienced IoT app developers
  • 24*7 Robust supports team
  • Deliver project on time and in budget
  • Agile Development Process
  • Excellent coding standards
  • Customer-centric Approach
  • Result-oriented strategies
  • Continuous upgradation
  • Easy Scalability Options
  • Developer replacement guarantee
  • Strict NDA terms & IP security
  • Client Success Manager

contentLists.heading: Can I hire IoT app development team for my IoT project?
contentLists.content: Yes, you can hire IoT app developers’ team as per your requirement. Our IoT app development team provides you list of IoT developers and their resumes. Then, you can take interview of each IoT developers and hire them.

contentLists.heading: Will you provide maintenance and support after developing an IoT app?
contentLists.content: Yes, our IoT app development team will provide maintenance and support after developing an IoT app. We will provide free maintenance and support if IoT app need minor changes otherwise we will charge.

contentLists.heading: What are examples of IoT devices which you developed?
contentLists.content: We developed Remote Home Check – a Healthcare IoT Project for our respective client.

contentLists.heading: What steps are followed for IoT app development process by your company?
contentLists.content:
Our IoT app development process:

  • Phase I – Kickoff Meeting
  • Phase II – Project Management & Resource Allocation.
  • Phase III – Mockup Design
  • Phase IV – Agile Development – Programming& Quality Assurance
  • Phase VII – Final Deployment

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop an IoT app?
contentLists.content: The development cost of IoT application is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop an IoT app, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time does it require to build an IoT app?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your IoT app development project and factors like integration, features, and functionalities you want to have in your IoT application. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your project requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch us today.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use for IoT project management?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and manage every phase of IoT app development.

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: Is there any process you follow to keep my IoT app idea confidential?
contentLists.content: Yes, we sign NDA agreement for keep your IoT app idea confidential.
